title: 404 error when on a specific page
description: Hi there, I tried to access my sales data in my account today but it showed a 404 error. Can you please help me fix this?

title: Authentication failure
description: Hello, We're receiving authentication failure errors while attempting to use your APIs. Can someone please help?

title: Issues with reports
description: Hello there, Our Report metrics over the last week is at zero and can't be correct? Are you facing any issues?

title: Push notification not delivered to Android users
description: We triggered a push campaign yesterday at 9 PM. More than 50% of Android users did not receive the notification. Delivery logs show failure reasons. Please help investigate as it impacts conversions.

title: Push campaign delay of 20 minutes
description: A push campaign scheduled at 6 PM was delivered at 6:20 PM. This delay is causing engagement loss. Kindly check queuing delays.

title: iOS users receiving duplicate push notifications
description: Several iOS users reported receiving the same push notification twice. Happening mostly on iOS 14 devices. This impacts user trust. Please verify the sending logic.

title: Push template not rendering dynamic content
description: Dynamic variables like {{user.first_name}} are not rendering in the push message. The notification shows raw placeholders instead of values.

title: Push campaign stuck in “Processing”
description: Campaign scheduled at 3 PM is not progressing beyond “Processing.” No users have received the notification yet.

title: Segmented push went to wrong users
description: A push intended for “New Users” was mistakenly sent to “Active Users.” Need root cause analysis.

title: Push notification sound not playing
description: The custom sound configured in the push payload is not playing on Android devices.

title: Opt-in rate dropped suddenly
description: Push opt-in rate dropped from 62% to 41% overnight. No configuration changes from our side.

title: Email campaign showing 0% open rate
description: Our email campaign sent to 18,000 users is showing 0% opens. Tracking seems broken.

title: Email images not loading
description: Banner images in email templates are not loading in Gmail inbox.

title: Bounce rate increased
description: Bounce rate increased to 30% from 5% in last week. Affecting deliverability.

title: HTML email broken in Outlook
description: Custom HTML template layout breaks in Outlook desktop app.

title: Scheduled email sent immediately
description: Email scheduled for 10 AM was sent instantly after creation.

title: Incorrect UTM values
description: Links in email have incorrect UTM parameters affecting analytics reporting.

title: Unsubscribe link broken
description: Clicking unsubscribe leads to a 404 error page.

title: Segment not updating
description: CSV imported yesterday but segment count still unchanged.

title: Real-time segment showing 0 users
description: Real-time segment with simple conditions shows 0 users incorrectly.

title: Condition “Last Seen < 7 days” not working
description: Users who logged in within the last week are not included in the segment.

title: Segment filter not saving
description: When saving a segment, filters disappear automatically.

title: Duplicate users in segment
description: Some users appear twice inside the segment list.

title: Predictive segment accuracy drop
description: Predictive model accuracy fell from 83% to 55% without changes.

title: Dashboard taking too long to load
description: Analytics dashboard now takes ~45 seconds to load.

title: Conversion funnel not updating
description: Funnel metrics have not updated in two days.

title: Negative values in revenue report
description: Revenue analytics showing negative values for several hours.

title: Missing dates in user chart
description: Daily active user chart missing data for 2 days.

title: Event tracking outage
description: No events recorded between 2 AM–5 AM.

title: API returning 500 error
description: Server-to-server API calls failing with HTTP 500 since morning.

title: Webhook delivery failed
description: Webhook failed for 200 user events.

title: SDK events missing
description: Mobile SDK events not showing in analytics dashboard.

title: API rate limit exceeded
description: Rate limit exceeded even though usage is low.

title: OAuth token expiring fast
description: OAuth token expiring after 20 min instead of the usual 60 min.

title: API latency increased
description: Response time increased from 200 ms to 900 ms.

title: Webhook sending old data
description: Webhook delivered previous event instead of the latest one.

title: Journey step stuck in loop
description: Users stuck in Step 3 of onboarding loop.

title: Condition-based journey not triggering
description: Users completing “Add to Cart” are not moving to next step.

title: Journey email not sent
description: Automated journey email not sent to new users.

title: A/B test not running correctly
description: Both A and B paths are receiving equal traffic despite new configuration.

title: Journey trigger delayed
description: Trigger fires 10 minutes late.

title: Journey metrics not updating
description: Journey completion rate remains 0%.

title: Users exiting journey early
description: Users drop off after Step 1 instead of progressing.

title: push notifications
description: facing the notification issue

title: facing the notification issue
description: facing the notication problem
